questions.question: Last night, there was a food accident. The ________ were ill, but no ________ were lost.
questions.explanation: child的复数形式是children，life的复数形式是lives。根据句意'多人患病但无人死亡'，需用复数形式。

questions.question: --This is a photo of ________ when they were young. --OK, how happy they both looked!
options: D. my father's and my mother
questions.explanation: 表示两人共同拥有的照片时，只需在最后一个人名后加所有格's。此处指父母两人的合照，正确形式为my father and mother。

questions.question: The new student is in ________ , Grade Two.
questions.explanation: 班级编号用'Class+基数词'表示，且首字母大写。'三班'的正确表达是Class Three。

questions.question: Today is September 10th. It's ________ Day. Let's go and buy some flowers for our teachers.
questions.explanation: Teachers' Day表示'教师节'，以复数名词的所有格形式表示全体教师的节日，不需要定冠词the。

questions.question: The market isn't far from here. It's only ________ bicycle ride.
options: D. an hour and a half
questions.explanation: 表示'半小时的自行车程'需用所有格形式。half an hour是单数概念，所有格为half an hour's。

questions.question: -- What would you like to drink, girls? -- ________ , please.
questions.explanation: coffee是不可数名词，'两杯咖啡'用two cups of coffee表示。选项B有拼写错误（coffe），D错误使用复数coffees。

questions.question: During Christmas, people get together and sing Christmas songs for ________.
questions.explanation: for fun是固定搭配，意为'为了娱乐'。句意表达'人们唱歌是为了娱乐'，符合圣诞节氛围。

questions.question: Some ________ are flying kites near the river.
questions.explanation: some后接可数名词复数。child的复数是children（非childs），boy的复数是boys。根据动词are确定用复数boys。

questions.question: After the exam, we'll have ________ holiday.
questions.explanation: 表示'两周的假期'需用所有格。以s结尾的复数名词直接加'，正确形式是two weeks' holiday。

questions.question: They are those ________ bags. Please put them on the bus.
questions.explanation: bags属于多个访客（复数），需用复数所有格visitors'。句意'那些是游客们的包'。

questions.question: -- How many workers are there in your factory? -- There are two ________.
questions.explanation: hundred前有具体数字two时用单数形式。hundreds of表示约数'数百'，但此处有具体数字two。

questions.question: --What do you think of the ________ the Moonlight Sonata by Beethoven? -- It sounds really wonderful.
questions.explanation: Moonlight Sonata（月光奏鸣曲）是音乐作品，且回答'sounds wonderful'指向听觉体验，故选music。

questions.question: There is not enough ________ in the corner for the fridge.
questions.explanation: room作不可数名词时表示'空间'。句意'角落没有足够空间放冰箱'，其他选项无此含义。

questions.question: ________ comes from sheep and some people like eating it.
questions.explanation: mutton（羊肉）来自绵羊且可食用。wool（羊毛）不可食用，pork（猪肉）来自猪，milk（牛奶）来自牛。

questions.question: If you don't take more ________ , you'll get fat.
questions.explanation: take exercise是固定搭配，意为'锻炼'。句意'不多锻炼会发胖'，其他选项不符合逻辑。

questions.question: My school is about twenty ________ walk from here.
questions.explanation: 表示'二十分钟的步行'需用复数所有格。minute以e结尾，复数加s后直接加'，即minutes' walk。

questions.question: Mum, I have ________ to tell you!
questions.explanation: news是不可数名词，无复数形式。表达'一些好消息'用some修饰，选项B是唯一正确形式。

questions.question: Which is the ________ to the post office?
questions.explanation: the way to表示'去...的路'。address是地址，street/road需搭配介词on，而此处问的是'路线'。

questions.question: I stayed at ________ last Sunday.
questions.explanation: stayed at后接地点。my uncle's=my uncle's home（叔叔家），所有格's表示住所。uncles'是复数所有格（多位叔叔的家），不符合单数语境。

questions.question: Maths ________ not easy to learn.
questions.explanation: 学科名称（如maths）作主语时，谓语动词用单数。尽管以s结尾，但表示单一学科概念。

questions.question: They are living ______ happy life now.
questions.explanation: 固定搭配live a...life表示'过...的生活'，此处需用不定冠词a修饰单数可数名词life

questions.question: ______ bag on ______ desk is mine.
questions.explanation: 两处都需用the：第一空特指特定书包，第二空固定搭配on the desk表示'在桌子上'

questions.question: There is ______ empty box on the table.
questions.explanation: empty以元音音素/ɪ/开头，需用an表示'一个空盒子'

questions.question: Do you like ______ music of the film 'Titanic'?
questions.explanation: 特指某部电影的原声音乐需用the，表示'那部电影的特定音乐'

questions.question: On ______ Saturday, I stay in ______ bed till 12:00.
questions.explanation: 两处都不加冠词：星期名称前零冠词；in bed是固定短语表示'卧床休息'

questions.question: ______ Browns have been to China twice.
questions.explanation: 姓氏复数前加the表示'布朗一家人'，指整个家庭

questions.question: Don't make any noise in ______ class.
questions.explanation: 固定短语in class表示'在课堂上'，抽象概念前不加冠词

questions.question: This is such ______ interesting story that you must listen to it.
questions.explanation: interesting以元音音素/ɪ/开头，需用an表示'一个有趣的故事'

questions.question: Next week they will go to Australia by ______ air.
questions.explanation: 固定搭配by air表示'乘飞机'，交通工具类短语前不加冠词

questions.question: Which is bigger, ______ sun or ______ moon?
questions.explanation: 两处都需用the：表示宇宙中独一无二的天体名称前必须加定冠词

questions.question: This isn't ______ pencil case. I left ______ at home.
questions.explanation: 第一空：形容词性物主代词my修饰名词pencil case；第二空：名词性物主代词mine=my pencil case，避免重复

questions.question: The English novel is quite easy for you. There are ______ new words in it.
questions.explanation: few修饰可数复数名词words，表否定含义'几乎没有'，符合句意'生词很少'

questions.question: -- Can I come this evening or tomorrow morning? -- ______ OK. I'm free today and tomorrow.
questions.explanation: either指'两者中任意一个'，符合语境'今天明天都行'

questions.question: The population of China is much larger than ______.
questions.explanation: that指代不可数名词population，避免重复，构成比较结构

questions.question: -- When shall we meet again? -- Make it ______ day you like. It's all the same to me.
questions.explanation: any表示'任意一天'，强调不限选择范围

questions.question: He said ______ at the meeting and just sat there silently.
questions.explanation: nothing表示'什么都没说'，与'sat silently'形成逻辑呼应

questions.question: -- Do you know the lady ______ is interviewing our headmaster? -- Yes, she is a journalist from CCTV.
questions.explanation: 关系代词who引导定语从句，在从句中作主语指代人lady

questions.question: ______ of people in the world are sending information by E-mail ever day.
questions.explanation: 表示“数以千万计”，many millions of people 是正确的固定搭配，表示大范围数量

questions.question: About ______ of the surface of the earth ______ covered with water.
questions.explanation: 分子大于1时分母用复数quarters；主语three quarters是单数概念，谓语用is

questions.question: It will take ______ time to finish the work.
options: A. one and a half years'
C. one and a half year's
questions.explanation: one and a half years表示'一年半'，所有格加在years后，即years' time

questions.question: -- How long will your stay here? -- For ______.
questions.explanation: 固定表达a day or two表示'一两天'，相当于one or two days

questions.question: When he moved to Germany in ______ , he was already in ______.
questions.explanation: in the fifties表示'在50年代'；in his sixties表示'在他60多岁时'

questions.question: My brother lives in ______ on ______ floor.
options: D. the room six; the second
questions.explanation: 房间号表达：Room + 基数词（Room six）；楼层表达：the + 序数词 + floor（the second floor）

questions.question: December is ______ month of the year.
questions.explanation: 序数词前加定冠词the，twelfth表示'第十二个月'

questions.question: This took place in the ______.
questions.explanation: 1940s表示'20世纪40年代'，正确形式为年份后加s

questions.question: It is only ______ from my home to the train station.
questions.explanation: 复数名词所有格：以s结尾的复数名词直接加'（ten minutes' walk）

questions.question: There are ______ in this building, I live on ______.
options: A. nine floors, the ninth floor
B. nine floor, the ninth floor
D. ninth floor, the ninth floor
questions.explanation: 基数词+floors表总层数；序数词+ninth floor表具体楼层

questions.question: The water behind the Three Gorges Dams should be ______ higher than downstream.
questions.explanation: 数量单位用复数形式：数词+连字符+单数名词作定语（sixty-five meters）

questions.question: There are ______ days in a year.
questions.explanation: 百位数表达：hundred后加and，如three hundred and sixty-five

questions.question: -- How many teachers are there in your school? -- ______, but I'm not sure.
questions.explanation: hundred前有具体数字时用单数形式，one hundred表示'一百'的约数

questions.question: There are ______ doctors and nurses working hard in that hospital.
questions.explanation: thousand前有具体数字two时用单数形式（two thousand）

questions.question: -- What's one fourth and a half, do you know? -- Yes, it's ______.
questions.explanation: 1/4 + 1/2 = 1/4 + 2/4 = 3/4，分数表达：分子基数词分母序数词（three fourths）

questions.question: Now children, turn to page ______ and look at the ______ picture in Lesson Two.
questions.explanation: 页码用基数词（page twenty）；顺序用序数词（the first picture）

questions.question: Both of the two rulers are broken. I want to buy a ______ one.
questions.explanation: third表示'第三把尺子'，序数词前省略冠词a表示'再一、又一'

questions.question: December is the ______ month in year.
questions.explanation: twelfth是twelve的序数词形式，表示'第十二个月'

questions.question: -- What is the date today? -- It's ______.
questions.explanation: 日期表达：月份+序数词（June the sixteenth），也可写作June 16th

questions.question: She knows a lot about China as she has been to China ______.
questions.explanation: four times表示'四次'，time作'次数'解时用复数形式

questions.question: A policeman saw two thieves ______ a girl's mobile phone on the bus and he caught them at once.
questions.explanation: see sb doing sth表示'看见某人正在做某事'，强调动作进行中

questions.question: The Chinese pingpong players will join in the match. Let's ______ them success.
questions.explanation: wish sb sth是固定搭配，表示'祝愿某人...'；hope后不接双宾语

questions.question: He is so careless that he always ______ his school things at home.
questions.explanation: leave表示'遗忘（物品）'，forget表示'忘记（事情）'

questions.question: ---Who ______ the computer? I want to use it. ---Timmy. He ______ it for a week.
questions.explanation: 第一空：现在完成时强调影响；第二空：keep表示'保管'，用完成时强调持续时间

questions.question: Look! One of the girls ______ the door.
questions.explanation: Look!提示现在进行时；one of...作主语时谓语用单数

questions.question: If you don't feel well, you may just ______.
questions.explanation: stop doing停止正在做的事；stop to do停下来去做另一件事

questions.question: ---Where can we get a baseball? ---Let's ______.
questions.explanation: borrow from表示'从...借入'；lend to表示'借给'

questions.question: ---My model ship doesn't work. ---Don't worry. I'll have it ______ this afternoon.
questions.explanation: have sth done表示'让他人做某事'，此处用过去分词repaired

questions.question: You ______ wash your hands before meals.
questions.explanation: must表示'必须'，强调必要性；can/may表示可能性

questions.question: Will you ______ the light? It's dark in the room.
questions.explanation: turn on打开（电器）；turn off关闭；get on/off上/下车

questions.question: My name is Zhang Mingjian. You may ______ me Zhang Mingjian or Mr Zhang.
questions.explanation: call sb sth表示'称呼某人...'；say/tell需要接说话内容

questions.question: There is going to ______ a game in our school this afternoon.
questions.explanation: There be句型将来时：There is going to be

questions.question: You'd better ______ smoking. It's bad for your health.
questions.explanation: give up放弃；eat up吃光；come up出现；get up起床

questions.question: ---How do you like this book? ---I think it has nothing to ______ with our study.
questions.explanation: have nothing to do with固定搭配，表示'与...无关'

questions.question: ---Where is Mr Brown? I have some questions to ask him. ---He ______ the office.
questions.explanation: has gone to表示'已去某地（未返回）'；has been to表示'曾经去过'

questions.question: The bus kept the people ______ for twenty minutes.
questions.explanation: keep sb doing使某人持续做某事，用现在分词形式

questions.question: I believe the scientists will ______ a better way to heal the disease.
questions.explanation: come up with提出（想法）；get on with相处；go on with继续；catch up with赶上

questions.question: ---Why do you often ______ this pink blouse? ---Because it fits me well.
questions.explanation: wear表示'穿着'状态；put on表示'穿上'动作；try on试穿

questions.question: Jack always runs faster than Peter, but this time he ______ him.
questions.explanation: fell behind落后；went over复习；put off推迟；dropped off掉落

questions.question: The Internet ______ it easy to get much new information in a short time.
questions.explanation: make it + adj. + to do使做某事变得...；其他动词无此用法

questions.question: We ______ out by that time that he ______ a thief for a longtime.
questions.explanation: 主句用过去时found；从句动作发生在主句前，用过去完成时had been

questions.question: It so happened that they ______ the novel before.
questions.explanation: before表示'之前'，用过去完成时had read

questions.question: She ______ for nearly two hours.
questions.explanation: keep doing持续做某事；nearly two hours可用一般过去时

questions.question: Spring ______ after winter.
questions.explanation: 自然规律用一般现在时

questions.question: ---I hear some noise in the next room. ---Oh, yes. Your sister ______ there.
questions.explanation: hear提示正在发生的动作，用现在进行时

questions.question: All the students ______ to plant trees and there's nobody in the classroom.
questions.explanation: have gone表示'已去未归'，与'nobody in classroom'呼应

questions.question: Stop! A little boy ______ the street.
questions.explanation: Stop!提示正在进行的动作，用现在进行时

questions.question: The girl ______ to milk since last winter.
questions.explanation: since last winter表示从过去持续到现在，用现在完成时

questions.question: What ______ to you this morning?
questions.explanation: this morning（已过去）用一般过去时；happen无被动语态

questions.question: ---The old man looks healthy. ---Yes. He ______ some running after he gets up.
questions.explanation: 强调习惯性动作对现在的影响，用现在完成时

questions.question: She didn't pass the exams because she ______ her lessons well.
questions.explanation: 准备考试发生在考试失败前，用过去完成时

questions.question: This story ______ in a faraway village in Europe many years ago.
questions.explanation: ago用一般过去时；happen无被动语态

questions.question: ---Mr King came back to our village. ---Really? For what? ---The old man ______ the noise in the city.
questions.explanation: hate表示长期心理状态，用一般现在时

questions.question: His father ______ for a week.
questions.explanation: for a week需用延续性状态；dead是形容词表状态

questions.question: My mother is ill. I ______ stay at home and look after her.
questions.explanation: have to强调客观需要；must强调主观义务；would表意愿

questions.question: ---Do you know the Frenchman? ---Yes. I ______ him for two years.
questions.explanation: for two years用现在完成时，表示持续状态

questions.question: They ______ all their money, so they have to walk home.
questions.explanation: 现在完成时强调结果'钱已花光'

questions.question: Great changes ______ in the city, and a lot of factories ______.
options: A. have been taken place, have been set up
B. have taken place, have been set up
C. have taken place, have set up
D. were taken place, were set up
questions.explanation: take place无被动语态；set up factories需用被动语态

questions.question: ---When did Kate's grandma die? ---While the doctors ______ on her.
questions.explanation: while引导过去进行时，表示'当医生正在手术时'

questions.question: ---Who are you looking for? ---Mr White. ---Wait here for a while. The class meeting ______ over in half an hour.
questions.explanation: in half an hour表示将来时间，用将来时

questions.question: If she's not at home, you ______ try telephoning her at the office.
questions.explanation: will表示'可以'，提出建议；could/would更委婉

questions.question: All the new words ______ up in the dictionary yet.
questions.explanation: words与look up是被动关系；yet用于否定句完成时

questions.question: I don't want to speak to her, but I ______.
questions.explanation: have to表示'不得不'；must后接动词原形

questions.question: Hurry up, or you ______ the train.
questions.explanation: or引导的将来情况，用将来时；miss the train固定搭配

questions.question: The new library ______ next week.
questions.explanation: library与build是被动关系；next week用将来时被动语态

questions.question: ---Where's Mabel? ---She ______ ping pong behind the teaching building.
questions.explanation: 问现在位置，用现在进行时表示正在进行的动作

questions.question: Quite a few tall buildings ______ the last two years.
questions.explanation: buildings与put up是被动关系；the last two years用完成时

questions.question: Man-made-satellites ______ into space by many countries.
questions.explanation: 复数主语用have been sent；强调至今已完成的动作

questions.question: I ______ all the words on the black board. May I go home now?
questions.explanation: 现在完成时强调动作已完成，与'May I go now'呼应

questions.question: Nobody knew ______ a living in that country.
questions.explanation: make a living谋生；how to do it需接宾语，how to make a living正确

questions.question: The old man needs at most five hour's sleep a night, but he ______ for over seven hours tonight.
questions.explanation: sleep表示睡眠状态；fall asleep/go to sleep表示入睡动作

questions.question: I'm really getting too fat. From now on, I ______ more exercise and eat less food.
questions.explanation: From now on表示从今以后，用将来时

questions.question: You don't need ______ her. I ______ her for several times.
questions.explanation: need to do需要做某事；for several times用现在完成时

questions.question: His speech in English was difficult ______.
questions.explanation: 形容词+to do结构，主动形式表被动：difficult to follow

questions.question: When he was a child, he tried to find ways ______ people ______ life more.
options: D. to be helped, to enjoy
questions.explanation: ways to do sth做某事的方法；help sb do sth帮助某人做某事

questions.question: What did your class teacher ______ you to ______ at the meeting?
questions.explanation: tell sb to do告诉某人做某事；say强调说话内容

questions.question: ______ the bus until it ______.
options: D. Don't get off, will stop
questions.explanation: 否定祈使句；until引导时间状语从句，主将从现（主句祈使句，从句现在时）

questions.question: The living standard of the people in Shanghai ______ in the last ten years.
questions.explanation: rise不及物动词（rise-rose-risen），表示'上升'；raise及物动词需接宾语

questions.question: --What did Mr Jones do before he moved here? --He ______ a city bus for over twenty-five years.
questions.explanation: before he moved用过去时；for over...表示过去持续的动作

questions.question: Hurry up! The play ______ for ten minutes.
questions.explanation: for ten minutes需用延续性动词；be on表示'（演出）进行中'

questions.question: Don't worry, sir. I'm sure I can run ______ to catch up with them.
questions.explanation: enough修饰形容词/副词需后置；根据catch up需要'足够快'，用fast enough

questions.question: The text is very easy for you. There are ______ new words in it.
questions.explanation: few修饰可数名词words，表否定'几乎没有'；a few表肯定'有一些'

questions.question: It's such an ______ film that all the students are ______ in it.
questions.explanation: interesting描述事物特性；interested描述人的感受，be interested in固定搭配

questions.question: Mingming got up very ______, so he came to school half an hour ______.
questions.explanation: late作副词'晚地'；lately表示'最近'。句意'起得晚导致迟到半小时'

questions.question: I am ______ worried about my parents' healthy conditions.
questions.explanation: sometimes表示'有时'；sometime指'某时'；some times指'几次'

questions.question: We don't have ______ every day.
options: A. a lot of school works
questions.explanation: work作'功课'解时不可数，用much修饰；many修饰可数名词

questions.question: --Look! How fast the two horses are running! --Oh, yes! They are nearly ______.
questions.explanation: neck and neck表示'并驾齐驱'，描述两匹马速度几乎相同

questions.question: ______ children there are in family, ______ their life will be.
questions.explanation: the more...the more...结构；children可数用fewer；life更好用better

questions.question: Most of the people in Guangdong are getting ______.
options: B. more rich and more rich
questions.explanation: 比较级叠用表示'越来越...'，rich的比较级是richer

questions.question: Which lesson is ______, this one or that one?
questions.explanation: 两者比较用比较级，difficult是多音节词，加more构成比较级

questions.question: "A ______ accident happened at 7:30 a.m." said the policeman ______.
questions.explanation: 第一空形容词serious修饰名词accident；第二空副词seriously修饰动词said

questions.question: ______ is it from our school to Lupu Bridge?
questions.explanation: how far询问距离；how long问时间长度；how often问频率

questions.question: In our city, it is ______ in July, but it is even ______ in August.
questions.explanation: 第一空原级hot描述天气；第二空even+比较级hotter表示'更热'

questions.question: This pencil is ______ that one.
questions.explanation: 两者比较用比较级longer than；as...as中间用原级

questions.question: The station is two kilometers ______ the hospital.
questions.explanation: away from表示'距离...有多远'，常与具体距离连用

questions.question: Beijing has ______ many buses that there is often a traffic jam in rush hours.
questions.explanation: so...that固定结构，表示'如此...以至于'

questions.question: This box is ______ heavy ______ I can't carry it.
questions.explanation: so...that引导结果状语从句，表示'如此重以至于搬不动'

questions.question: India has the second ______ population in the world.
questions.explanation: 序数词+最高级，largest表示'第二大人口'，smallest不符合事实

questions.question: Mary received ______ many postcards at Christmas.
questions.explanation: so修饰形容词many；such修饰名词（such a lot of postcards）

questions.question: The cake smells ______. Please throw it away.
questions.explanation: smell作系动词后接形容词bad，表示'闻起来坏了'

questions.question: -- What was the weather like yesterday? -- It was terrible. It rained so ______ that people could ______ go out.
questions.explanation: rain hard下大雨；hardly几乎不。句意'雨太大几乎无法出门'

questions.question: The meeting will be held in half an hour, but they haven't got everything ready______.
questions.explanation: yet用于否定句句末，表示'尚未'；already用于肯定句

questions.question: -- What about the English novel? -- It's not very difficult. There are only ______ new words in it.
questions.explanation: a few表肯定'有一些'，符合'不难'的语境；few表否定'几乎没有'

questions.question: How beautiful she sings! I've never heard ______.
questions.explanation: 否定词+比较级表最高级，a better voice表示'从未听过更好的声音'

questions.question: Mr Smith always has ______ to tell us.
options: A. some good pieces of news
B. some pieces of good news
C. some good piece of news
D. some piece of good new
questions.explanation: news不可数，用pieces of修饰；形容词good修饰news需后置

questions.question: I'm afraid the headmaster is ______ busy to meet the visitors.
questions.explanation: much too修饰形容词busy表示'过于忙碌'；too much修饰不可数名词

questions.question: -- Dad, when will you be free? You agreed to go to the seaside with me four days ago. -- I am sorry, Jean. But I think I will have a ______ holiday soon.
questions.explanation: 复合形容词作定语，用连字符连接，名词用单数（four-day holiday）

questions.question: The scenery in Sanya looks ______, especially "Tian Ya Hai Jiao" is ______.
questions.explanation: look后接形容词fine；最高级前加the，the most famous表示'最著名的'

questions.question: What a ______ day it is! Let's go out for a walk.
questions.explanation: lovely表示'宜人的'，符合外出散步的语境；其他选项天气不佳

questions.question: Of the two Australian students, Masha is ______ one. I think you can find her easily.
questions.explanation: 两者比较用比较级，且需加the表示特指（the taller one）

questions.question: Last Saturday I was busy ______ my homework.
questions.explanation: be busy with固定搭配，表示'忙于某事'

questions.question: My teacher was very angry ______ me because I was late ______ school again.
questions.explanation: be angry with sb 对某人生气；be late for 迟到

questions.question: Kathy prefers a hula hoop ______ a book.
questions.explanation: prefer A to B 固定搭配，表示'比起B更喜欢A'

questions.question: I will invite some friends ______ my eighteenth birthday party.
questions.explanation: invite sb to 邀请某人参加

questions.question: How long has he worked ______ an inventor?
questions.explanation: work as 表示'作为...工作'

questions.question: My uncle arrived ______ the airport ______ the morning of May 3.
questions.explanation: arrive at+小地点；具体日期上午用on

questions.question: I will always help my friends when they are ______ trouble.
questions.explanation: in trouble 固定搭配，表示'处于困境'

questions.question: There is nothing ______ air ______ space.
questions.explanation: nothing but 除了；in space 在太空中

questions.question: I won't be back ______ June.
questions.explanation: not...until 直到...才

questions.question: ______ the age ______ twenty, he had written two books.
questions.explanation: at the age of 固定搭配，表示'在...岁时'

questions.question: Mary fell ______ her bike and hurt her right leg.
questions.explanation: fall off 从...上摔下

questions.question: He has been away ______ China ______ three years ago.
questions.explanation: away from 离开；since+过去时间点

questions.question: When I was ______ school, I was ______ the school football team.
questions.explanation: in school 在校求学；on the team 在队中

questions.question: I think he will be ______ two o'clock.
questions.explanation: in+时间段 表示'在...之后'

questions.question: The teacher was given some flowers ______ his students.
questions.explanation: 被动句中动作执行者用by引出

questions.question: Look, the birds are singing ______ the tree.
questions.explanation: 鸟在树内部用in；在表面用on

questions.question: He left the classroom ______ all the windows open.
questions.explanation: with+复合结构 表示伴随状态

questions.question: My sister is ill today. She doesn't feel ______ eating anything.
questions.explanation: feel like doing 想要做某事

questions.question: It's too dangerous. You must keep the children away ______ the fire.
questions.explanation: keep away from 远离

questions.question: My parents arrived ______ a cold night.
questions.explanation: 具体某天的夜晚用on

questions.question: You should apologize ______ her ______ stepping on her foot.
questions.explanation: apologize to sb for sth 为某事向某人道歉

questions.question: The students are sitting ______ the table, reading the newspaper.
questions.explanation: sit at table 坐在桌旁（准备用餐）

questions.question: The city is famous ______ its football, and people there are very proud ______ their city football team.
questions.explanation: be famous for 以...闻名；be proud of 以...自豪

questions.question: We are doing better ______ English ______ our teacher's help.
questions.explanation: do better in 在...做得更好；with help 在帮助下

questions.question: Don't worry ______ me. Everything is going well ______ me.
questions.explanation: worry about 担心；go well with 进展顺利

questions.question: He was late ______ school today, and she came late ______ school, too.
questions.explanation: be late for 迟到；come to school 来学校

questions.question: --- Do you know what happened ______ Peter yesterday? --- He was hit ______ a car.
questions.explanation: happen to sb 某人发生某事；被动句中动作执行者用by

questions.question: I like clothes made ______ cotton.
questions.explanation: be made from 由...制成（原料不可见）

questions.question: He will go to Hangzhou ______ his car tomorrow.
questions.explanation: in one's car 乘私家车（在车内）

questions.question: ______ my surprise, the Englishman gave up halfway ______ the end.
questions.explanation: to one's surprise 令某人惊讶；in the end 最终

questions.question: I saw the great changes ______ my own eyes.
questions.explanation: with one's own eyes 亲眼目睹

questions.question: You look tired. Instead ______ working indoors you should be out ______ a walk.
questions.explanation: instead of 代替；go out for a walk 出去散步

questions.question: Wushu is becoming more and more popular ______ foreigners.
questions.explanation: popular among 在...群体中受欢迎

questions.question: If you are able to get the tickets tomorrow, please tell me ______ phone.
questions.explanation: by phone 通过电话（方式）

questions.question: There is going to be a report ______ Chinese history ______ our school this evening.
questions.explanation: report on 关于...的报告；in school 在学校

questions.question: Before 1990 there was no airline ______ the two cities.
questions.explanation: between 在两者之间

questions.question: She is dressed ______ a white skirt ______ red flowers.
questions.explanation: dressed in 穿着；with 表示'带有...装饰'

questions.question: It's bad ______ you to go to work ______ breakfast.
questions.explanation: without breakfast 没吃早餐

questions.question: It's very nice ______ you to get me two tickets ______ the World Cup.
questions.explanation: It's nice of sb 某人真好；tickets for 某活动的票

questions.question: --- Where have you been these days? --- I have been to Bei Daihe ______ a friend ______ Canada.
questions.explanation: with a friend 和朋友一起；from Canada 来自加拿大

questions.question: --- Would you like some coffee? --- Yes, and please get me some milk, too. I prefer coffee ______ milk.
questions.explanation: prefer A to B 比起B更喜欢A

questions.question: --- When did Mr Smith come here? --- ______ nine o'clock yesterday morning.
questions.explanation: at+具体钟点时间

questions.question: You must stand ______ line when you are waiting ______ a bus.
questions.explanation: stand in line 排队；wait for 等候

questions.question: --- Jack, will you be home ______ time to see the children before they go to bed? --- No problem.
questions.explanation: in time 及时

questions.question: China lies ______ the east of Asia and ______ the North of Australia.
questions.explanation: in+大区域内部；to+大区域外部

questions.question: If you can't pass the exam, you'll fall ______ others.
questions.explanation: fall behind 落后

questions.question: I have a swim every day ______ yesterday.
questions.explanation: except 除...之外（不包括）

questions.question: We all know that the earth moves ______ the sun.
questions.explanation: move around 围绕...旋转

questions.question: The sunlight is coming in ______ the window.
questions.explanation: through 穿过（透明介质）

questions.question: This room is full ______ students and that one is filled ______ teachers.
questions.explanation: be full of 充满；be filled with 被...填满

questions.question: Which is bigger, the sun ______ the moon?
questions.explanation: 选择疑问句用or连接两个选项，表示'太阳和月亮哪个更大'

questions.question: Hurry up, ______ we will miss the train.
questions.explanation: or表示'否则'，用于警告性条件句（快点，否则会错过火车）

questions.question: He hurt her ______ badly ______ she had to see a doctor.
questions.explanation: so...that...表示'如此...以至于...'，引导结果状语从句

questions.question: Look out! The traffic is moving fast. It's ______ dangerous ______ cross the street.
questions.explanation: too...to...表示'太...而不能...'，描述危险程度无法过街

questions.question: It's ______ far ______ walk home from here. Let's take a bus.
questions.explanation: too...to...表示'太远不能步行'，建议坐公交

questions.question: "Why didn't Nick come to school yesterday?" " ______ he was ill."
questions.explanation: because引导原因状语从句，解释缺勤原因

questions.question: John fell asleep ______ he was listening to the music.
questions.explanation: while表示'当...时'，强调两个动作同时发生（听音乐时睡着）

questions.question: "I won't go to the party tomorrow." " ______ you told me you would. What's happening?"
questions.explanation: but表示转折，对比'之前答应'和'现在反悔'的情况

questions.question: Stop cutting trees, ______ the earth will become worse and worse.
questions.explanation: or表示'否则'，警告性条件句（停止砍树，否则环境恶化）

questions.question: "Be careful! Don't break the bottles. Do you hear ______ I said, David?" "Yes, mum."
questions.explanation: what引导宾语从句，作hear的宾语（听到我说的话）

questions.question: Mr Smith comes from Australia, but he has worked in China for five years. So you can talk with him ______.
options: A. either in English or in Chinese
B. not in Chinese but in English
C. just in English, not in Chinese
D. neither in Chinese nor in English
questions.explanation: either...or...表示'或者...或者...'，根据语境他可能双语都会

questions.question: I can ______ swim ______ skate. Will you please teach me?
questions.explanation: neither...nor...表示'既不...也不...'，后接请求教学体现零基础

questions.question: When I got the news that the ship would sink, I was ______ frightened ______ my legs couldn't move forward.
questions.explanation: so...that...引导结果状语从句（如此害怕以至于腿软）

questions.question: She bought a digital camera online ______ she saved a lot of time.
questions.explanation: so that引导目的/结果状语从句（网购相机以节省时间）

questions.question: Beijing has ______ many buses that there is often a traffic jam in rush hours.
questions.explanation: so...that...固定结构，so修饰many表示'公交车如此多'

questions.question: Hurry up, ______ you will miss the train. It's leaving in ten minutes.
questions.explanation: or表示'否则'，紧急警告（十分钟内火车将离站）

questions.question: Not only his parents but also his brother ______ to the Summer Palace. They haven't been back.
questions.explanation: not only...but also...遵循就近原则，brother是单数；has gone表示'去了未归'

questions.question: You'd better do it ______ your mother did.
questions.explanation: as引导方式状语从句，表示'按照你母亲的做法'

questions.question: ______ they are brothers, they don't look like each other at all.
questions.explanation: though引导让步状语从句，表示'尽管是兄弟，但外貌完全不同'

questions.question: -- When did you know the news? -- I knew nothing about it ______ my friend told me.
questions.explanation: not...until...固定结构，表示'直到朋友告知才知道'

questions.question: The question ______ by us soon.
options: C. is going to be discussed
questions.explanation: 主语question与discuss是被动关系；soon表示将来，用将来被动语态

questions.question: The old man was quite weak after the accident, so he______.
questions.explanation: 主语he与look after是被动关系；must be done表示'必须被照顾'

questions.question: All the new words ______ up in the dictionary yet.
questions.explanation: words与look up是被动关系；yet用于否定句完成时被动语态

questions.question: There was no room for you. All the seats ______.
questions.explanation: seats与take是被动关系；动作发生在过去（was no room）之前，用过去完成被动

questions.question: A model ship ______ his son by Mr More.
questions.explanation: ship与make是被动关系；be made for表示'为...制作'

questions.question: ---Dad, please open the door, it ______. ---OK, dear. I am coming.
questions.explanation: 门'被锁'的状态用现在被动语态；强调当前状态

questions.question: This kind of sweater______ very soft.
questions.explanation: feel作系动词表'摸起来'，用主动形式接形容词soft

questions.question: ---Have all the students known that our class will visit the factory this afternoon? ---Yes. Every student______ about it.
questions.explanation: student与tell是被动关系；用过去被动表示'被通知'

questions.question: The cake ______ delicious.
questions.explanation: smell作系动词表'闻起来'，用主动形式接形容词delicious

questions.question: My father has given up smoking since he ______ on.
questions.explanation: he与operate是被动关系；since后接过去时间点用被动语态

questions.question: A new school ______ these days.
questions.explanation: school与build是被动关系；these days表示进行中，用现在进行被动

questions.question: The cake ______ delicious.
questions.explanation: 同第9题，系动词smell用主动形式表特征

questions.question: I______ there would be a football match on Channel 8 tomorrow.
questions.explanation: I与tell是被动关系；用过去被动表示'被告知'

questions.question: The librarian told me that the book______ for two weeks.
questions.explanation: book与keep是被动关系；for two weeks需用延续性动词keep

questions.question: When______ this kind of computer ______?
questions.explanation: computer与use是被动关系；询问过去使用情况用过去被动

questions.question: The new computers______ to the village school as present last month.
questions.explanation: computers与give是被动关系；last month用过去被动

questions.question: I really don't know______ about it.
questions.explanation: 疑问词+不定式结构；what to do表示'该做什么'（do缺宾语）

questions.question: Your shoes______. You'd better come to get them in half an hour.
questions.explanation: shoes与mend是被动关系；in half an hour表示动作进行中

questions.question: Though he had often made his little sister______, today he was made______ by her.
questions.explanation: make sb do使某人做（省略to）；被动时需恢复to（was made to cry）

questions.question: When______ the accident______?
questions.explanation: happen是不及物动词，无被动语态；用助动词did构成疑问句

questions.question: Tell him _____ the light.
questions.explanation: 固定搭配：tell sb not to do sth（告诉某人不要做某事），且 turn on 是固定短语需完整使用

questions.question: It took us more than two hours _____ the dinner.
questions.explanation: take time doing sth 表示‘花费时间做某事’，强调动作持续过程

questions.question: We felt the earth _____.
questions.explanation: 感官动词 feel 后接省略 to 的不定式（动词原形），表示感知完整动作

questions.question: The students were made _____ the text ten times.
questions.explanation: 使役动词 make 在被动语态中需恢复 to，构成 be made to do sth 结构

questions.question: The chair looks rather hard _____, but in fact it is very comfortable.
questions.explanation: 不及物动词 sit 需加介词 on 才能与逻辑宾语 chair 形成动宾关系

questions.question: Nobody knows _____ next.
questions.explanation: 疑问词+不定式结构，what 作 do 的宾语，表示‘该做什么’

questions.question: It is very important _____ us _____ these words.
questions.explanation: It is + adj. + for sb + to do sth 固定句型，for 引出逻辑主语

questions.question: _____ English well, one must have a lot practice.
questions.explanation: 不定式作目的状语，表示‘为了说好英语’的目标

questions.question: I'm going to the library _____ the books.
questions.explanation: 不定式表目的，根据 library 语境应选‘归还’（return）

questions.question: We went to town _____ some shopping.
questions.explanation: 固定搭配 do some shopping，不定式表进城目的

questions.question: The funny story _____ me laugh.
questions.explanation: 使役动词 make 的过去式，接省略 to 的不定式 laugh

questions.question: After the final exam, I think all the students want _____.

options.C: to stop to have a rest

questions.explanation: want to do sth 结构，且 stop to do 表示‘停下来（学习）去休息’

questions.question: It is very kind _____ you to help me with my housework. It is hard _____ me to do all the work.
questions.explanation: kind 描述人品质用 of，hard 描述事物特征用 for

questions.question: Many people think it very difficult _____ English.
questions.explanation: think it + adj. + to do 结构，且 learn English 符合语义

questions.question: The teacher asked the students _____ her _____ the word again.
questions.explanation: ask sb to do sth 结构，且 pronounce（发音）是语言学习的准确动作

questions.question: Remember _____ the book here tomorrow.
questions.explanation: remember to do 表示‘记得要做（未做）’，bring 强调‘带来’

questions.question: Let's have a rest, shall we? --Not now. I don't want to stop _____ the letter yet.
questions.explanation: stop doing 表示‘停止正在进行的动作’（写信未完成）

questions.question: This physics problem is too difficult. Can you show me _____, Wang Lin? --Sure.
questions.explanation: how 表示方式，代词 it 需放在短语动词 work out 中间

questions.question: How can I improve my spoken English? --You have to practise _____ as much as you can.
questions.explanation: practise 后接动名词作宾语，表示‘练习说英语’

questions.question: How about going hiking this weekend? --Sorry. I prefer _____ rather than _____.

options.A: to stay at home, go out
options.B: to go out, stay at home

questions.explanation: prefer to do rather than do 固定结构，前后动词形式需一致

questions.question: Do you know when the World Cup _____ next week? -- Next Friday. When it _____, I will ring you.
questions.explanation: 第一空：宾语从句表示将来用will begin；第二空：when引导时间状语从句，主将从现用begins

questions.question: Today or tomorrow? -- What are you talking about? -- We are talking about _____ to give a talk on WTO.
questions.explanation: 根据对话'今天还是明天'，应选when表示时间，构成'when to do'结构作宾语

questions.question: I wonder _____.
questions.explanation: 宾语从句需用陈述语序（连接词+主语+谓语），且谓语动词live需加s保持主谓一致

questions.question: Are you sure you have to? It's been very late. -- I don't know _____ I can do it if not now.
questions.explanation: 根据上下文'如果不是现在'，应选when表示'何时能做'，说明时间上的不确定性

questions.question: Would you please tell me _____? -- In a small village near Ningbo.
questions.explanation: 回答地点用where，且宾语从句需用陈述语序（where+主语+谓语）

questions.question: The photograph will show you _____.

options.A: what does our village look like
options.C: how does our village look like

questions.explanation: look like是固定搭配，需用what引导宾语从句，且用陈述语序（what+主语+谓语）

questions.question: Can you guess if they _____ to play basketball with us? -- I think they'll come if they _____ free.
questions.explanation: 第一空：if引导宾语从句表示是否，可用将来时；第二空：if引导条件状语从句，主将从现用are

questions.question: --Where does he come from? -- Pardon? -- I asked where_____.
questions.explanation: 宾语从句需用陈述语序，且主句asked是过去时，从句需用过去时态came保持时态一致

questions.question: She wondered _____.

options.A: how much he cost the computer
options.B: how much he paid for the computer
options.C: how much the computer will cost him
options.D: how much did he spend on the computer

questions.explanation: pay for是正确搭配，主句wondered是过去时，从句需用过去时paid，且语序为陈述语序

questions.question: --Do you know _____? -- I'm not sure. Maybe he is a businessman.
questions.explanation: 根据回答'他可能是商人'，应询问身份(who)，且宾语从句需用陈述语序who he is

questions.question: Jim spends a lot of money on books_____he is not rich.
questions.explanation: though引导让步状语从句，表示'尽管他不富裕'的转折关系

questions.question: Kate fell into sleep _____she was listening to the music.
questions.explanation: while引导时间状语从句，表示'在听音乐过程中'同时发生的动作

questions.question: ---Is David at school today? ---No. He is at home _____he has a bad cold.
questions.explanation: because引导原因状语从句，说明'在家'的原因是'患重感冒'

questions.question: We won't have supper _____my mother comes back.
questions.explanation: until引导时间状语从句，表示'直到母亲回来才吃饭'的动作延续

questions.question: Speak to him slowly _____he may understand you better.
questions.explanation: so that引导目的状语从句，表示'说慢点'的目的是'让他更好理解'

questions.question: _____ she doesn't come on Sunday, I'll go fishing by myself.
questions.explanation: even if引导让步状语从句，表示'即使她不来'的假设条件

questions.question: It is four years _____I had left that small village.
questions.explanation: since引导时间状语从句，用于'It is+时间段+since...'结构，表示'自从离开已四年'

questions.question: _____the air moves, it is called wind.
questions.explanation: when引导时间状语从句，表示'当空气流动时'的时间条件

questions.question: We will go to the park _____it doesn't rain tomorrow.
questions.explanation: if引导条件状语从句，表示'如果不下雨'的前提条件

questions.question: _____little boys did _____much work.
questions.explanation: such...do构成结果状语从句的省略形式，表示'如此小的孩子做了如此多工作'的强调

questions.question: There are few new words in the passage _____we can't understand it.
questions.explanation: but引导转折状语从句，表示'生词少'与'不理解'的意外转折

questions.question: Go back _____you come from.
questions.explanation: where引导地点状语从句，表示'回到你来的地方'

questions.question: He reached the station _____the train had left.
questions.explanation: before引导时间状语从句，表示'到达车站'发生在'火车离开'之前

questions.question: ---Do you have a swimming pool? ---No, we don't. At least, not _____big _____yours.
questions.explanation: as/so...as引导比较状语从句，表示'不如你们的大'的比较关系

questions.question: Give me your paper _____you have finished it.
questions.explanation: after引导时间状语从句，表示'完成之后'的时间顺序

questions.question: It is raining hard, _____we have to stay at home.
questions.explanation: so引导结果状语从句，表示'雨大'导致'必须待在家'的结果

questions.question: ____you work harder, you'll never pass the final exam.
questions.explanation: unless引导条件状语从句，表示'除非更努力'的否定条件

questions.question: Look after the children _____I am out.
questions.explanation: while引导时间状语从句，表示'我不在期间'的时间段

questions.question: The village is _____far away _____I can't get there on foot.
questions.explanation: so...that引导结果状语从句，表示'如此远以致无法步行到达'的程度结果

questions.question: That is _____an interesting book _____I can't stop reading it.
questions.explanation: such...that引导结果状语从句，强调'如此有趣的书'导致'无法停止阅读'的结果

questions.question: Did you find the notebook _____ Jim had given me for my birthday?
questions.explanation: which引导定语从句修饰notebook（物），在从句中作given的宾语

questions.question: That's all _____ I have seen and heard.
questions.explanation: 先行词为all时，通常用that引导定语从句（但此处根据答案选what，需注意特殊用法）

questions.question: Have you seen the man _____ plan we were talking about _____ yesterday?
questions.explanation: whose表示所属关系（'那人的计划'），第二空about后接宾语从句省略关系代词

questions.question: The Oscar is one of the film prizes _____ offered to any Chinese actor or actress so far.
questions.explanation: 先行词被最高级修饰时用that，且prizes为复数，需用have been完成时被动语态

questions.question: He never reads anything _____ is not worth reading.
questions.explanation: 先行词为anything等不定代词时，必须用that引导定语从句

questions.question: The man _____ coat is black is waiting at the gate.
questions.explanation: whose表示所属关系（'那人的外套'），修饰coat作定语

questions.question: _____ cleans the classroom can go home first.
questions.explanation: the one who引导定语从句，表示'打扫教室的人'，who在从句中作主语

questions.question: The police caught the man _____ stole my handbag.
questions.explanation: that引导定语从句修饰man（人），在从句中作主语（可用who替换）

questions.question: The girl _____ is reading under the tree _____ my sister.
questions.explanation: who引导定语从句修饰girl，在从句中作主语；主句用is表示现在状态

questions.question: George Mallory was an English teacher _____ loved climbing.
questions.explanation: who引导定语从句修饰teacher（人），在从句中作主语
